Name: Pitchfork Kingdom
About the game: Experience nostalgic moments of excitement and wonder in this classic medieval fairy tale as you fight your way through the enchanted levels of Pitchfork Kingdom! At its core, this is a fast-paced, action-packed side scroller that is easy to pick up. Pitchfork Kingdom aims to bring feelings of joy and humor as it creates memorable moments in its fabled world. Six Unique and Exciting Levels Through simple yet deep mechanics, you will fight your way across the countryside, bandit-infested forests, and the castle walls while on your adventure. All the experience you gain will be put to the test with every new boss and mob that you fight. By Sword or Bow Equipped with your sword and your bow, the fate of the Kingdom is in your unlikely hands. Lots of Traps and Obstacles Bandits, knights, and a variety of traps and obstacles will attempt to stop you from completing your quest and achieving the happy ending.
